metadata.title: CVE-2018-4191 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation. Thisissue affected versions prior to iOS 12, tvOS 12, watchOS 5, Safari 12,iTunes 12.9 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4191` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-5.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-5.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-5.0-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-5.0-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.2-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
